creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: a: three panels of pounded indigo base fabric with self ties; continuous heavy horizontal embroidery with 2" deep tuck at center; scroll embroidery in three bands with silver metal ribbon on green, rose and black background; reds/greens and blues; below bands in center (11-1/2) square of embroidery surrounded by blue border; similar embroidery on orange and rose background; b: 16" x 17" panel attached by three knot buttons and loops; same background colors with 2" border and four corner triangles and center circle (3") surrounded by four large embroidered shapes; all bordered in silver metal ribbon in similar fashion
medium: Cotton, silk, silver metal ribbon; needlework
title: Baby Carrier
